---
layout: null
permalink: /robots.txt
---
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Auto-generated sitemap
Sitemap: {{ site.url }}/sitemap.xml

# Block development and build directories
Disallow: /_site/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /.sass-cache/
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /about/
Allow: /projects/
Allow: /links/

# Crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 0.5
